text:
@charliekirk11 Maybe your concern should be Red States in the South and Midwest having an ample supply of body bags, Hospital beds and PPE

Lock downs worked on the Eastern seaboard and nations in Europe that banned travel from the US due to the US government failure to contain Coronavirus
